title: Council Directive 82/786/EEC of 15 November 1982 amending Directive 75/268/EEC on mountain and hill farming and farming in certain less-favoured areas
header:
COUNCIL  DIRECTIVE
of 15 November 1982
amending Directive 75/268/EEC on mountain and hill farming and farming in certain less-favoured areas
(82/786/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendments provided or in Article 1 (1) shall take effect from 1 January 1982.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 November 1982.
For the Council
The President
N. A. KOFOED
